alert.note: Alert for Bennington; Eastern Windham; Western Windham (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 3:59PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Bennington and southwestern Windham Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 358 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Stratton, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Stratton, Wilmington, West Wardsboro, Dover, Marlboro, Jamaica, Wardsboro, Searsburg, Somerset, Wardsboro Center, South Newfane, Goose City, Williamsville, East Dover, Four Corners, Podunk, South Wardsboro, Medburyville, West Jamaica and Brookside. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
